Title: The Adventures of Aunt Ally & the Lil' Bitch
Plot: When Lacey's BFF Ally comes to town, they decide to "help" Jenna throw a rager. The next day, a forgetful and hungover Jenna struggles to reconstruct the events of the wild night and find out who she kissed.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Jessica Lu, Janelle Velasquez, Matthew Fahey, Barret Swatek
